Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: ~sstone1 Opened jira for issue we chatted yesterday.

Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: The problem, as seems, is that shim jar deployed to maven central was compiled with java 9.

Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: No way to update jar in maven central without increasing version. So, it will be fixed with 1.4.0 jar
